snap(-10,-40,-70)
sky(90,30,0)
ground(100,75,75)
polys(128,128,128)
texture(255,255,255,20)
clouds(255,30,30,0,-20000)
mountains(29313)
fadefrom(0)
stars()
name(The Test of Endurance)

nlaps(1)

set(77,0,1500000000,-100000000,0)

maxt(0,260000,0)
maxb(0,-210000,0)
maxr(0,210000,0)
maxl(0,-210000,0)

set(47,0,0,250,0)

chk(40,0,100000,250,0)

set(23,0,150000,250,0)p
set(23,0,150000,250,180)p
set(32,0,150000,250,0)pr

chk(40,0,200000,250,0)

set(24,-50000,200000,250,90)p
set(24,-50000,200000,250,-90)p
set(33,-50000,200000,250,90)pr

chk(40,-100000,200000,250,0)

set(24,-100000,150000,250,0)p
set(24,-100000,150000,250,180)p
set(53,-100000,150000,250,180)pr

chk(40,-100000,100000,250,0)

chk(40,0,100000,250,90)

set(24,50000,100000,250,90)p
set(24,50000,100000,250,-90)p
set(35,50000,100000,250,90)pr

chk(40,100000,100000,250,0)

set(24,104000,0,250,0)p
set(24,104000,0,250,180)p
set(62,104000,0,250,180)pr
set(24,96000,0,250,0)
set(24,96000,0,250,180)
set(63,96000,0,250,180)

chk(40,100000,-100000,250,0)

chk(40,0,100000,250,0)

set(23,-100000,-50000,250,150)p
set(23,-100000,-50000,250,-30)p
set(27,-100000,-50000,250,150)pr

chk(40,-200000,-200000,250,0)

set(23,-200000,-100000,250,0)p
set(23,-200000,-100000,250,180)p
set(31,-200000,-100000,250,0)pr

set(24,-200000,0,250,0)p
set(24,-200000,0,250,180)p
set(34,-200000,0,250,0)pr

set(23,-200000,100000,250,0)p
set(23,-200000,100000,250,180)p
set(52,-200000,100000,250,0)pr

chk(40,-200000,250000,250,0)

set(23,-1000,250000,250,-90)p
set(26,-1000,250000,250,-90)pr
set(26,1000,250000,250,90)p
set(23,1000,250000,250,90)p

chk(40,200000,250000,250,0)

set(23,200000,100000,250,0)p
set(23,200000,100000,250,180)p
set(31,200000,100000,250,180)pr

set(24,200000,0,250,0)p
set(24,200000,0,250,180)p
set(34,200000,0,250,180)pr

set(23,200000,-100000,250,0)p
set(23,200000,-100000,250,180)p
set(50,200000,-100000,250,180)pr

chk(40,200000,-200000,250,0)

chk(40,0,-200000,250,0)

chk(40,0,100000,250,0)
